actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wooden Greataxe
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (1d12+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Thorn
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (2d4+1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Brambly Bark
reactions.desc: When a creature the wood herald can see hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, the herald can extend sharp brambles along its body, dealing 2 (1d4) piercing damage to the attacker.

special_abilities.name: Plant Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The wood herald's Stealth is 18 while in any terrain with ample, obscuring plant life.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The wood herald is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Woodland Walk
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of nonmagical plants doesn't cost the wood herald extra movement. In addition, the herald can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
